Professional Summary
Surya is an IT Leader with consulting, cross-functional, leadership experience in In-
formation Technology which includes Analysis, Development, QA, Configuring, De-
ployment, Technical support, Manage in a wide range of industries, products and 
services. A decade of experience in Retail, Consumer Products goods, Beverages and 
Transportation, Airlines, Travel & Hospitality with Fortune 1000 clients driving growth 
on digital platforms.

services. A decade of experience in Retail, Consumer Products goods, Beverages and

across NA, APAC, EMEA and providing executive leadership. Rich management con-
sulting experience in directing large scale global business andIT initiatives bringing 
measurable value to organizations and developed trusted relationships for strategic 
accounts.
